name: Import contacts to EspoCRM from Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically import the contact data in EspoCRM. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-16B3TEz8U-inTOtQkHl-nlQ9LZaXkvnyuq5nuRqzTU/edit?usp=sharing).
